children.name: Product defects
expected 200 to equal 404
Verify that the admin can delete a sale record
expected '{"error":"BAD_REQUEST","message":"Quantity must be greater than 0","status":400,"timestamp":"2026-02-07T07:37:01.342754888"}' to include 'Quantity must be greater than 1'
Verify that the system returns an error when quantity is less than 1
expected 12 to equal 14
Verify that pagination works correctly for a non-admin user
expected 201 to equal 403
Verify that a non-admin user cannot perform a sell plant operation
expected 404 to equal 403
Verify that a non-admin user cannot delete a sale record
expected 404 to equal 200
Verify that a non-admin user can retrieve a sale record by its ID
expected [ Array(11) ] to have a length of 0 but got 11
Verify that a non-admin user sees a "No Sales Found" message when there are no sales records
Timed out retrying after 5000ms: expected 'Value must be greater than or equal to 1.' to include 'Quantity must be greater than 0'
Verify error message for sell quantity less than 1
